description: Polished dark brown leather oxfords with a sleek, tapered toe, perfect for formal or business attire.
Casual grey and white high-top sneakers featuring convenient velcro straps and textured fabric panels.
Stylish navy blue high-top sneakers that mix matte and patent leather finishes with matching laces
Clean, chunky white platform sneakers with a thick sole and a contrasting black accent on the heel.
